segments.text: This is my house.Let me show you around it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How beautiful the detached house is !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's marvelous ! The lawn looks like a green carpet , and the garden with so many lovely flowers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We had the grass cut and the flowers trimmed this morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here is the swimming pool and we can swim later .
segments.speaker: S1
